title: Bloomberg Markets: Briggs on Range of Risks From Cyber Threats
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Briggs on Range of Risks From Cyber Threats
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Bill Briggs Chief Technology Ofcr Deloitte Consulting Discussing how businesses keep a safe tech infrastructure and protect their clients.
